name: Cathobot Upgraded
description:
Fast paced Top-Down Shooter where you roll your buffs. Get a speed boost and fly on the map, or become smaller to get in the tight gaps! 

It was originally made for GTMK2022 and was upgraded afterwards. A lot of added features, such as: proper tutorial, totally reworked and redesigned all levels, redesigned UI, medals for competition, ghost to compare with your best run, fixed tons of bugs and many more. 

Hey you! Yeah, you! I would really appreciate any feedback. Weather you liked it or not. This is only a prototype, so I'd really like to know if I should continue improving this.

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Roll Buff

E - Pick Weapon

Esc - Pause Game

R - Restart Level
